blocks.content:
Maintain your own connectors or use a third party service like Tray.io or Zapier

Tray.io “[Embedded](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=2TdANFVzN-c&feature=youtu.be)" is their white label solution for SaaS platforms. The claims are pretty bold (e.g. can bash out connectors in < 10 days) and the white label/branding is helpful. They have a graphQL api you can use to list available integrations  and display them in your app/integrations marketplace page and trigger the OAuth flow for each directly from there. All the OAuth interfaces are under your brand for the end user.
